title: Can my visuals pass a K-pop audition? I'm auditioning for the Big 3. - Quora

response.answer_text: I am not saying that you are not beautiful every person is beautiful but the thing as you dint have any features to stand in korean beauty standard. ….. so there is really less chance to be choosen but maybe you gotta chooses who knows the future maybe your dance or singing or anything can help you became kpop idol…..

No. You are really pretty but you don't meet Korean beauty standards. So I don't think your visuals will pass. The other thing is age, you need to be under 17 to give an audition once you become 18 then becoming a trainee is extremely difficult. And you need to be good in Korean too.

you’re like really pretty. i think they would. but you have kind of tanned skin so maybe it would be difficult. don’t worry tho, there are many naturally tanned idols. your other features actually do kind of fit into their standards.
I’m not trying to be racist or anything but since you don’t look ‘Korean’ enough, I don’t think your visuals are enough. I am Indian too and I understand. (Sorry!!) Good luck!

It looked like you were wearing liner. Nobody can judge accurately if you wear makeup. Anyway, you should focus on talent more than visuals, because makeup can make you look as pretty as you want, but talent… that you need to have genuinely. Focus on talent!
